benchmark_details.name: MTCMB (Multi-Task Benchmark for Evaluating LLMs on Traditional Chinese Medicine)
benchmark_details.overview: MTCMB is a multi-task benchmark for evaluating large language models on Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) knowledge, reasoning, and safety, designed to fill gaps in existing benchmarks by providing a more comprehensive evaluation framework.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a rigorous evaluation framework for assessing and guiding the development of TCM-capable AI systems.

data.source: Curated datasets from authoritative sources including national licensing exams, clinical case records, and classical TCM texts.
data.annotation: Expert-verified and curated in collaboration with certified TCM practitioners.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the match of predicted outputs to ground truth reference answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance of LLMs in accurately handling TCM-specific tasks.
methodology.validation: Comprehensive validation through expert review and performance analysis across various LLMs.
